awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: An investigator on the Moscow police force relentlessly pursues the solution to a triple homicide which occurred in Moscow's Gorky Park. He finds that no one really wants him to solve the crime because it is just the tip of a complex conspiracy which involves the highest levels of the Moscow city government.

title: Gorky Park
